title: no arm.S in libcgo
body:
by **prem.mallappa**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. hg pull -u
2. cd $GOROOT; export GOOS=linux; export GOARCH=arm
3. cd src; ./all.bash

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?
compiles fine and all tests pass, compiles fine gotests results in segfault

What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?
linux/arm

Which revision are you sync'ed to?  (hg log -l 1)
4021:3d43362ac8d4

Please provide any additional information below.
using kubuntu 9.10, had to pull in qemu-arm-static for gotest to run.
